#define BODYPATH_H

Define Documentation

#define BODYPATH_H

BodyPath - contains an array of body coordinates, width, visibility and confidence information, one record per frame. Additionally stores the header with body id, tags and start frame

Invisible records can be disregarded thus letting BodyPath store multiple segments of a broken path
